sentences.en: Godliman fell silent, but Terry talked on.
sentences.cn: 戈德利曼一言不发, 特里却滔滔不绝.

sentences.en: I've never met such an ardent pacifist as Terry.
sentences.cn: 我从未见过像特里这样热情的和平主义者.

sentences.en: Joyce is talking to Terry, an instructor at the dive center.
sentences.cn: 乔依丝正与潜水中心的教练泰瑞说话.

sentences.en: Millson saw the workman, Terry, descending the ladder.
sentences.cn: 米尔森看见工人特里正从梯子上下来。

sentences.en: Terry actually says "Oh, shucks!" when complimented on her singing.
sentences.cn: 人们赞誉她的歌声时，特里实际上会说“噢，没什么!”

sentences.en: Terry can't participate in the match because he has hurt his foot.
sentences.cn: 特里不能参加比赛,因为他扭了脚.

sentences.en: Terry had a soft spot for me.
Terry Puhl leads off for the Houston Astros.
sentences.cn: 特里·皮尔为休斯敦太空人队率先击球。

sentences.en: Terry Street was demolished a few years ago.
sentences.cn: 泰瑞街已在数年前拆掉.

sentences.en: Terry was sitting on the bottom stair.
sentences.cn: 特里正坐在最下面的一级楼梯上。

sentences.en: Terry was very cut up about Jim's death.
sentences.cn: 吉姆的死让特丽无比悲伤。

sentences.en: Terry's got a new bird , ie girl - friend.
Terry's speech was inconsistent with the book he had written.
sentences.cn: 泰里的演说和他写的书互相矛盾.

sentences.en: Unable to find anyone to coach him, Terry Sullivan bought a book.
sentences.cn: 由于找不到教练, 特里-沙利文买了一本书.

sentences.en: When I look over and see Terry I tingle all over.
sentences.cn: 当我放眼望去见到特里时，我整个人兴奋不已。

phrases.tran_cn: （毛巾，围巾等）两端的留有绒穗的物品

trans.tran_cn: 毛巾布，（用以做毛巾的）毛圈棉织物
